text: Miguel Palmer (born Miguel Ángel Palomera Gonzali; 1 November 1942 – 18 October 2021) was a Mexican actor. He was born in Villahermosa, Mexico. He was known for his roles in Bodas de odio and Dos hogares. Palmer died on 18 October 2021 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors
title: Miguel Palmer
